name: Into the Dead 2
overview: Cross the Zombie Apocalypse in a frantic race to save your family. Equip yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do everything you need to survive. Mutilate, grind and massacre the dead, keep moving forward at any cost! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to survive? - A story divided into 60 stages divided into 7 chapters, each offering its share of unique challenges to be met. - 3 different ends to discover. - 8 Pets Loyaux. From the cutest dogs to the most ferocious tigers, these allies will help you fight and set up, and will put their special skills at your disposal. - 8 classes and 25 unique weapons. Each of them can even accommodate up to - - 7 additional improvements. - Additional scripted events. 36 additional levels complete history with unique environments, weapons and companions. Arcade Mission mode: Eliminate the living dead with each weapon and aim for the best scores to unlock the following challenge. Thanks to the bear (new pet) and the blade launcher (new weapon), you can mutilate your opponents to make your way. - The game is compatible with HD vibrations, Joy-Con controllers and the pro controller.
